game_plan.overview: A fantasy RPG where players embark on a quest to find a lost artifact, navigating a grid-based world, interacting with NPCs, and managing their items.
game_plan.mechanics: Players can move through a grid world, interact with characters, manage an inventory, and pause or exit the game smoothly.

file.name: main.py
file.description: Entry point of the game, initializes Pygame and starts the main game loop. It handles quitting the game when necessary.

file.name: game.py
file.description: Contains the main game loop and state management (running/paused). Responsible for handling events, game updates, and rendering to the screen.

file.name: characters.py
file.description: Defines Player and NPC classes, managing their attributes and interactions within the game.

file.name: world.py
file.description: Handles the generation and management of the game world along with tile interactions.

file.name: inventory.py
file.description: Manages the player's inventory, allowing items to be added, removed, and used.

file.name: ui.py
file.description: Manages user interface components, including health bars and inventory displays, drawing them on the screen.
